REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C L f0869 reute u f BC-IA-SO-MINN-DIRECT-HOG 04-07 0040

TEXT.TITLE: IA SO-MINN DIRECT HOGS SEEN UP 1.00 DLR-PRIVATE
TEXT.BODY: Iowa direct hog prices are expected 1.00 dlr higher, private sources said. Country sales seen at 49.00 to 50.00 and Plants at 50.00 to 51.00 dlrs per cwt. Reuter
